subject: Basketball (College)
Disabilities
lead_paragraph: Despite being born without a left hand and forearm, Zach Hodskins has a guaranteed roster spot with the Florida Gators next season, an affirmation of his basketball skill.
snippet: Despite being born without a left hand and forearm, Zach Hodskins has a guaranteed roster spot with the Florida Gators next season, an affirmation of his basketball skill.
